briefdescription.para: Acquire a reference to the chat message.

simplesect.para: The same LinphoneChatMessage object.

briefdescription.para: Release reference to the chat message.
Retrieve the user pointer associated with the chat message.

simplesect.para: The user pointer associated with the chat message.

briefdescription.para: Assign a user pointer to the chat message.

parameterdescription.para: The user pointer to associate with the chat message.

briefdescription.para: Returns back pointer to LinphoneCore object.

simplesect.para: the LinphoneCore object associated with this message.

briefdescription.para: Linphone message can carry external body as defined by rfc2017.

simplesect.para: external body url or NULL if not present.

briefdescription.para: Linphone message can carry external body as defined by rfc2017.
Get the time the message was sent.

simplesect.para: the timestamp of when the message was sent.

briefdescription.para: Returns wehther the message has been sent or received.

simplesect.para: TRUE if message has been sent, FALSE if it has been received.

briefdescription.para: Get origin of the message.

simplesect.para: the LinphoneAddress of the sender.

briefdescription.para: Get destination of the message.

simplesect.para: the LinphoneAddress of the recipient.

briefdescription.para: Get the content type of a chat message.

simplesect.para: The content type of the chat message

briefdescription.para: Set the content type of a chat message.

detaileddescription.para:
This content type must match a content that is text representable, such as text/plain, text/html or image/svg+xml.
message
LinphoneChatMessage object.
content_type
The new content type of the chat message

briefdescription.para: Get text part of this message.

detaileddescription.para:
Introduced in 01/07/2020
message
LinphoneChatMessage object.
The text in UTF8 or NULL if no text.

briefdescription.para: Set a chat message text to be sent by linphone_chat_room_send_message().

detaileddescription.para:
Introduced in 01/07/2020
message
LinphoneChatMessage
text
The text in UTF8 to set.
0 if succeed.

briefdescription.para: Get the message identifier.

detaileddescription.para:
It is used to identify a message so that it can be notified as delivered and/or displayed.
message
LinphoneChatMessage object.
The message identifier.

briefdescription.para: Linphone message has an app-specific field that can store a text.

detaileddescription.para:
The application might want to use it for keeping data over restarts, like thumbnail image path.
message
LinphoneChatMessage object.
the application-specific data or NULL if none has been stored.

briefdescription.para: Linphone message has an app-specific field that can store a text.

detaileddescription.para: The application might want to use it for keeping data over restarts, like thumbnail image path.
Invoking this function will attempt to update the message storage to reflect the change if it is enabled.

parameterdescription.para: the data to store into the message.

briefdescription.para: Returns the chatroom this message belongs to.

simplesect.para: the LinphoneChatRoom in which this message has been sent or received.

briefdescription.para: Get if a chat message is to be stored.

simplesect.para: Whether or not the message is to be stored

briefdescription.para: Set if a chat message is to be stored.

detaileddescription.para:
This content type must match a content that is text representable, such as text/plain, text/html or image/svg+xml.
message
LinphoneChatMessage object.
to_be_stored
Whether or not the chat message is to be stored

briefdescription.para: Get the state of the message.

simplesect.para: the current LinphoneChatMessageState of the message.

briefdescription.para: Get if the message was encrypted when transfered.

simplesect.para: TRUE if the message was encrypted when transfered, FALSE otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Get the file_transfer_information (used by call backs to recover informations during a rcs file transfer)

simplesect.para: a pointer to the LinphoneContent structure or NULL if not present.

briefdescription.para: Start the download of the LinphoneContent referenced in the LinphoneChatMessage from remote server.

parameterdescription.para: the LinphoneContent object to download (must have the linphone_content_is_file_transfer() method return TRUE).

simplesect.para: FALSE if there is an error, TRUE otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Cancel an ongoing file transfer attached to this message.
Send a chat message.
Returns the local address the message was sent or received with.

simplesect.para: the LinphoneAddress of the local address used to send/receive this message.

briefdescription.para: Add custom headers to the message.
Retrieve a custom header value given its name.

simplesect.para: the custom header value or NULL if not found.

briefdescription.para: Removes a custom header from the message.

parameterdescription.para: name of the header to remove

briefdescription.para: Returns wether the message has been read or not.

simplesect.para: TRUE if message has been marked as read, FALSE otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Get full details about delivery error of a chat message.

simplesect.para: a LinphoneErrorInfo describing the details.

briefdescription.para: Returns wether the chat message is a forward message or not.

simplesect.para: TRUE if it is a forward message, FALSE otherwise

briefdescription.para: Gets the forward info if available as a string.

simplesect.para: the original sender of the message if it has been forwarded, NULL otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Returns wether the chat message is a reply message or not.

simplesect.para: TRUE if it is a reply message, FALSE otherwise

briefdescription.para: Returns the ID of the message this is a reply to.

simplesect.para: the original message id.

briefdescription.para: Returns the address of the sender of the message this is a reply to.

simplesect.para: the original message sender LinphoneAddress.

briefdescription.para: Returns the LinphoneChatMessage this message is a reply to.

simplesect.para: the original message LinphoneChatMessage.

briefdescription.para: Returns wether the chat message is an ephemeral message or not.

detaileddescription.para:
An ephemeral message will automatically disappear from the recipient's screen after the message has been viewed.
message
LinphoneChatMessage object.
TRUE if it is an ephemeral message, FALSE otherwise

briefdescription.para: Returns lifetime of an ephemeral message.

detaileddescription.para:
The lifetime is the duration after which the ephemeral message will disappear once viewed.
linphone_chat_message_is_ephemeral()
message
LinphoneChatMessage object.
the lifetime of an ephemeral message, by default 0 (disabled).

briefdescription.para: Returns the real time at which an ephemeral message expires and will be deleted.

simplesect.para: the time at which an ephemeral message expires. 0 means the message has not been read.

briefdescription.para: Fulfill a chat message char by char.

detaileddescription.para:
Message linked to a Real Time Text Call send char in realtime following RFC 4103/T.140 To commit a message, use linphone_chat_room_send_message()
message
LinphoneChatMessage object.
character
T.140 char
0 if succeed.

briefdescription.para: Add a listener in order to be notified of LinphoneChatMessage events.

parameterdescription.para: A LinphoneChatMessageCbs object holding the callbacks you need.

briefdescription.para: Remove a listener from a LinphoneChatMessage.
Gets the current LinphoneChatMessageCbs.

detaileddescription.para:
This is meant only to be called from a callback to be able to get the user_data associated with the LinphoneChatMessageCbs that is calling the callback.
message
LinphoneChatMessage object
The LinphoneChatMessageCbs that has called the last callback.

briefdescription.para: Adds a file content to the ChatMessage.
Creates a LinphoneContent of type PlainText with the given text as body.

detaileddescription.para:
Introduced in 01/07/2020
message
LinphoneChatMessage object.
text
The text in UTF8 to add to the message.

briefdescription.para: Adds a content to the ChatMessage.
Removes a content from the ChatMessage.
Returns the list of contents in the message.

simplesect.para: The list of LinphoneContent. LinphoneContent

briefdescription.para: Gets whether or not a file is currently being downloaded or uploaded.

simplesect.para: TRUE if download or upload is in progress, FALSE otherwise

briefdescription.para: Gets the list of participants for which the imdn state has reached the specified state and the time at which they did.

parameterdescription.para: The LinphoneChatMessageState the imdn have reached (only use LinphoneChatMessageStateDelivered, LinphoneChatMessageStateDeliveredToUser, LinphoneChatMessageStateDisplayed and LinphoneChatMessageStateNotDelivered)

simplesect.para: The list of participants. LinphoneParticipantImdnState

briefdescription.para: Gets the callId accociated with the message.

simplesect.para: the call Id

briefdescription.para: Gets the list of reactions received for this chat message.

detaileddescription.para:
Warning: list is ordered by content of reaction message, not by received timestamp!
message
LinphoneChatMessage object.
The sorted list of reaction if any. LinphoneChatMessageReaction

briefdescription.para: Returns our own reaction for a given chat message, if any.

simplesect.para: Our own LinphoneChatMessageReaction for that message if any, NULL otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Returns wether the chat message has a conference invitation content or not.

simplesect.para: TRUE if it has one, FALSE otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Creates a emoji reaction for the given chat mesage.

detaileddescription.para:
To send it, use linphone_chat_message_reaction_send().
message
the message you want to react on
utf8_reaction
the emoji character(s) as UTF-8.
a LinphoneChatMessageReaction object.

briefdescription.para: Returns wether the chat message has a text content or not.

simplesect.para: TRUE if it has one, FALSE otherwise.

xrefdescription.para: 27/10/2020. Check if linphone_chat_message_get_contents() contains a LinphoneContent for which it's content type is PlainText.

briefdescription.para: Get text part of this message.

simplesect.para: text or NULL if no text.

briefdescription.para: Get the path to the file to read from or write to during the file transfer.

simplesect.para: The path to the file to use for the file transfer.

briefdescription.para: Start the download of the file from remote server.

parameterdescription.para: #LinphoneChatMessageStateChangeCb status callback invoked when file is downloaded or could not be downloaded

briefdescription.para: Start the download of the file referenced in a LinphoneChatMessage from remote server.
Resend a chat message if it is in the 'not delivered' state for whatever reason.
Set the path to the file to read from or write to during the file transfer.

parameterdescription.para: The path to the file to use for the file transfer.

briefdescription.para: Get the LinphoneChatMessageCbs object associated with the LinphoneChatMessage.

simplesect.para: The LinphoneChatMessageCbs object associated with the LinphoneChatMessage.

briefdescription.para: Set a chat message text to be sent by linphone_chat_room_send_message()

parameterdescription.para: The text is in System Locale.

simplesect.para: 0 if succeed.

briefdescription.para: Gets the text content if available as a string.

simplesect.para: the LinphoneContent buffer if available in System Locale, null otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Creates a LinphoneContent of type PlainText with the given text as body.

parameterdescription.para: The text in System Locale to add to the message.

briefdescription.para: Return whether or not a chat message is a file transfer.

simplesect.para: Whether or not the message is a file transfer

xrefdescription.para: 06/07/2020 check if linphone_chat_message_get_contents() contains a LinphoneContent for which linphone_content_is_file_transfer() returns TRUE.

briefdescription.para: Return whether or not a chat message is a text.

simplesect.para: Whether or not the message is a text

xrefdescription.para: 06/07/2020 check if linphone_chat_message_get_contents() contains a LinphoneContent with a PlainText content type.
